author: henning
msg: Move the separator from String to char. This is a small performance penalty
now, because we must use String.valueOf(separator) in some places, but will be
a huge win, once the next commons-lang release is out which has join and
split methods using a char as separator. If we don't do this yet, we're doomed
to pull the then published method signatures over the whole 2.4 cycle.

author: henning
msg: This is a mapper which can be used for e.g. screen template mapping. It
doesn't look only for the Screen name itself, but also for a Screen called
"Default" + templating engine extension (e.g. Default.vm) in the same
package.

author: henning
msg: Make the template service mapper classes runtime configurable. Add
some docs about this and how the mapping is done to the template-service.xml
